title: Diary Of The Heart: Little Red Book
description: An intimate look into the life and mind of a writer.Little Red Book follows a year of W. R. Watkins’ life, exploring and detailing the highs and lows experienced, revealing Watkins' most personal moments on paper, capturing and preserving the raw emotions behind them. As Watkins delicately weaves these moments together, we see how alike we all are, and how we have to face the same problems. Throughout Little Red Book, we are treated to the inner workings of Watkins’ creativity, portraying his creative process behind the works, unedited and uncut. What creative gems could be found in these pages?Little Red Book is the second in the Diary Of The Heart poetry series. If you liked You. Are. Not. Alone., then you will love this book of raw emotional poetry.Unlock Little Red Book’s secrets today!
author: W.R. Watkins
